name: Lifestock
description:
150 years in the future, carbon footprint has become such a problem that people can volunteer to live in pods; they'll live in a beautiful dream and they'll be taken such good care of that it will extend their lives!

Meanwhile, this profits the planet as well... An AI that keeps the global ecosystem in check runs on the power of the human mind, power gained through those pods.

Try to build as many pods as possible before the timer runs out; the white number next to the brain icon needs to be higher than the number next to it, or the world's ecosystem will fail!

Good luck!

for our teachers: We're Team 12; (Podsheads)
